thread.title: Demi Lovato on What It's Like to Wear a Naked Dress When You're With Your Dad
thread.title_full: Demi Lovato on What It's Like to Wear a Naked Dress When You're With Your Dad

title: Demi Lovato on What It's Like to Wear a Naked Dress When You're With Your Dad
text: Demi Lovato on What It's Like to Wear a Naked Dress When You're With Your Dad Most Popular By Alyssa Bailey Feb 22, 2017 Demi Lovato joined the club of celebrities who have wore basically naked dresses on the red carpet two weeks ago when she attended the Grammys in a crocheted Julien Macdonald number. But the choice became a little weird when she was around her plus-one, her father. Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "I was actually on the red carpet with my dad and that was awkward," Lovato told Ellen DeGeneres. "Someone was like, 'tell us a secret about your dress' and I was like 'hehe, it's completely see-through…'" Getty Her father was okay with it, Lovato said, "but I don't know if he realized it was see-through so…" DeGeneres didn't buy that he missed that, which led Lovato to admit, "I don't know, we didn't talk about it!" And then her face got so red because...yeah. More from ELLE:
